means: <美>邻居，邻国( neighbor的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Japan has signed a convention of peace with a neighboring country.
sentence.Network_cn: 日本已与邻国签署了一项和平协定.

sentence.Network_en: Consonants are frequently assimilated to neighboring consonants.
sentence.Network_cn: 辅音往往被其邻近的辅音同化.

sentence.Network_en: His wife walked out on him, and was later seen in a neighboring city with another man.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的妻子抛弃了他, 而后有人在附近的一个城市看到她和另一个男人在一起.

PerfectNetExp.abs: TPO词汇题_百度文库 ... adjacent 邻近的， 毗连的 neighboring 邻近的； 接壤的 ensuing 接着发生，接踵而来.
They channeled the stream onto the neighboring property ., 他们把溪水引到邻近的土地上.
The algorithm clusters neighboring spatial objects to a cluster on the neighborhood relation in spatial., 该算法按照空间相邻关系 , 将空间相邻的空间目标聚类成一类.
接字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 接取〖 receive〗 接壤〖 neighboring〗 接任〖 takeoverajob〗.

这种相似用户通常被称为最近邻居（Nearest Neighbor）。用户之间的相似度是通过比较两个用户的行为选择矢量得到的。

stems_affixes.word_buile: neighbor邻居+ing表形容词→adj.邻近的, 接壤的
neighboring[adj.邻近的, 接壤的]→adj.邻近的
neigh连接,邻近+bor→n.邻居, 邻国
neighbor邻居+hood性质→n.附近, 邻近
